author: Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
text:
They have burnt our maid's house. Stones were pelted, many of them were injured. She tried calling police, but police arrived today. What was our fault, it's just we wanted to celebrate our festival. Sickening. 
This is what happened in Khargone, MP.

author: Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
text: Went for a movie yesterday, suddenly a man entered and asked to empty the theatre immediately. Upon asking the reason, he replied section 144 has been imposed. Peaceful community were throwing petrol bottles on us. We literally ran for our lives. ..

author: Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
text:
Why don't they directly change syllabus of IIT JEE from chem, physics and maths to physics, math, Computer language, quants, Management, entrepreneurships and administration???
Aage jake jab yahi krna hai.. atleast relatable toh hoga..

author: Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
text:
We have hardly used it in engineering that too only for core.
And what we study in engineering is not at all related to what we learn and do hands on I'm corporate.
I mean seriously having graduated in chemical and then working for consultancy in banks.

author: Pooja Gupta🇮🇳
text:
Really want someone to answer my question before I die:
What's the actual relation among what we study for IIT-JEE, what we study I'm College and what we learn in IT corporates. 
I mean studying chem, math and physics,
